Dear Aditi, 

Happy New Year, and I hope you have a fantastic start to the year!

My name is Pranjay Kumar, and I am a sophomore concentrating in finance and accounting at Stern. I am inquiring about your availability for a quick call in the coming weeks to hear about your experience at Accenture and why you chose a career in management consulting. 

As someone unsure of the best way to start a career in consulting, advice from someone with so much experience would be amazing. I'd love to learn about some of Accenture's amazing work and how it ties Stakeholder Management into its operations as an advisor. 

I have attached my resume for you to look over, and I would gladly work around your schedule to find a time that fits. A shared Stern and New Jersey background makes your advice and guidance even more significant for me. 

I look forward to hearing from you, and hope you have a great rest of your week!

Sincerely, 
Pranjay Kumar
